subject: Re: Updates to Pricing Details on ezymove.com.au

full_threads.body:
Can you reset it and ill try all avenues again and pose as a existing customer obtaining a second quote. Thank you
Get Outlook for iOS

I need it to send off quotes to the same contact for repeat customers. Im using the same contact because im posing as an existing customer so that they can receive a second/third+ quote email and sms and can pay their deposit the second time. This is crucial is that possible?
Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

Apologies, upon checking you are using your same account for testing. We could remove contact below so it reset again.

Let me know if you me to remove these 2 contacts so we could do a test again?

I understand your doing your best however it should all have been tested before commencement of the transfer to make sure everything was working 100%
Get Outlook for iOS

This has resulted in income loss the past couple of days ive been going back and forth and i shouldnt have to do this. Everytime i have been told its fixed another new problem has arised..
Get Outlook for iOS

I've just tested both of them and now both interstate and local are not shooting a text or an email to the customer…
Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

We are looking into this,

We can confirm that the Interstate pdwise is working (Please see the attached). Yes, you are the only recipient of that emai.


Regarding local Quote Submit Notification. We are working on a solution for the notification to your email. At the moment the "quote sent" emails is generated through pdwise.

We have exported all the quote sent entries. Please see the attached excel file.

We have notified Heath for a call

Is there someone i can call to discuss?
Get Outlook for iOS

Interstate is working for me with the email of the customers information however local is not working. I dont want these emails sent straight to the customer also. The crm is also not connected for the interstate submission only local
Get Outlook for iOS

Working now, i will test a payment myself to pay for the deposit to see if it works. Can i get an email of every enquiry Aswell? Also can you please give me a list or re-enter every enquiry that hasnt shown up in the past two days?
Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

We have made updates to the site. Can you please check now?

The Credit card should be showing up now.

I also need every enquiry emailed to me as discussed previously which i dont receive
Get Outlook for iOS

Deposit isnt working and i dont see brooke on my end. This is an urgent issue
Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

We are looking into this. I tried submitting it using joel@wolfiq.com.au and it went through.
Can you confirm?

We can also see brooke entry. Here is her quote link.
https://ezymove.com.au/local/?gf_token=aea12f005cf2447387ad3977264dc447

Can you check this customer? Im also not receiving personal emails yet to let me know of enquiries
Get Outlook for iOS
Get Outlook for iOS
(Time: 15mins)

Perfect thank you
Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

We have located the link, the email save on the link is invalid and It seems to be working correctly on our end press the book and pay now.

https://ezycleans.com.au/quote/general-clean/?gf_token=e9ff0e0c0c47453ea85c17708d9c19c1

Aly Pap
0410 228 265

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

We are looking into this, can you send us the link of this quote or the name of the contact in pdwise?
